title: 1 Bedrooms With AWESOME Views! #816
posting_body: Brand New Apartments on Capitol Hill
When Close to Home is Close to Everything
At Pivot Apartments, you’re close to everything Seattle has to offer.
Wind down at the end of the day or hype up at the start of the night, with modern design and newfixtures, our units are a blank slate for what fuels you.
Convenience & Community
AtPivot, we know how important community is when you’re finding a home.
That’s why we created arelaxing gathering space designed to bring the best of the Northwest to you.
You’ll find a firepit, bbqgrill, views of the Space Needle, and plenty of seating for you and your friends to catch up.
The Neighborhood
Pivot is perched along Pine Street at the intersection of downtown Seattle and Capitol Hill.
It's a mix ofenergized interiors and equally relaxing spaces with views for days, a stunning rooftop, and a fitnessroom.
There's a floorplan for every type ofneed including studios, open 1 bedrooms, and 1 and 2bedroom options.
From parking to package lockers, it's the perfect blend of convenience and specialtouches.
And bonus, Capitol Hill's popular bars and restaurants are right at your fingertips.
At Pivot,you'll never have a dull moment.
Whether you're working downtown or out for a night on the town,you're always a minute or two from home.
Contact Us
We’d love to answer your questions and help you book a guided tour:
All leasing is done online for your convenience.

Finally we can do in person touring on the property, but we would still need to abide by all socialdistancing guidelines, which require6 feet of distance between the guest and agent, and facemasksmust be worn during the full duration of the tour.
